title: Azathioprine: a medicine for conditions affecting the immune system
description: NHS medicines information on azathioprine - what it's used for, side effects, dosage and who can take it.
cleaned_text: azathioprine treats conditions that affect the immune system such as rheumatoid arthritis, Crohn's disease and ulcerative colitis, skin conditions such as lupus, and helps after an organ transplant, and how to take it.
